393{
394 if (spellInfo == nullptr)
395 return false;
396
397 // Normal case
398 if (spellInfo->getRequiresAreaId() > 0)
399 {
400 const auto requireAreaId = static_cast<uint32_t>(spellInfo->getRequiresAreaId());
401#if VERSION_STRING == TBC
402 if (requireAreaId != zone_id && requireAreaId != area_id)
403 return false;
404#elif VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
405 auto found = false;
406 auto areaGroup = sAreaGroupStore.lookupEntry(requireAreaId);
407 while (areaGroup != nullptr)
408 {
409 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
410 {
411 if (areaGroup->AreaId[i] == zone_id || areaGroup->AreaId[i] == area_id)
412 found = true;
413 }
414
415 if (found || areaGroup->next_group == 0)
416 break;
417
418 // Try next group
419 areaGroup = sAreaGroupStore.lookupEntry(areaGroup->next_group);
420 }
421
422 if (!found)
423 return false;
424#endif
425 }
426
427 // Check for area requirements set in database
428 const auto spellAreaMapBounds = getSpellAreaMapBounds(spellInfo->getId());
429 if (spellAreaMapBounds.first != spellAreaMapBounds.second)
430 {
431 for (SpellAreaMap::const_iterator itr = spellAreaMapBounds.first; itr != spellAreaMapBounds.second; ++itr)
432 {
433 if (itr->second.fitsToRequirements(player, zone_id, area_id))
434 return true;
435 }
436 }
437
438 return false;
439}

2042 if (sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL) ||
2043#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
2044 sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE) ||
2045#endif
2046 sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE) ||
2047 sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL) ||
2048 sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH))
2049 return true;
2050
2051 return false;
2052 };
2053
2054 // Calculate base spell coefficient
2055 auto spellCastTime = float(GetCastTime(sSpellCastTimesStore.lookupEntry(sp->getCastingTimeIndex())));
2056 if (spellCastTime < 1500)
2057 spellCastTime = 1500;
2058#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
2059 // Classic has 100% spell coefficient cap
2060 else if (spellCastTime > 3500)
2061 spellCastTime = 3500;
2062#else
2063 else if (spellCastTime > 7000)
2064 spellCastTime = 7000;
2065#endif
2066
2067 // Leech spells (spells that deal damage and heal)
2068 const auto hasLeechEffect = sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH);
2069 const auto hasLeechAura = sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH);
2070 const auto isLeechSpell = hasLeechEffect || hasLeechAura;
2071
2072 // Channeled spells
2073 if (hasChanneledEffect(sp))
2074 {
2075 auto spellDuration = baseDuration;
2076#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
2077 // Classic has 100% spell coefficient cap
2078 if (spellDuration > 3500)
2079 spellDuration = 3500;
2080#endif
2081 sp->spell_coeff_direct = spellDuration / 3500;
2082
2083 // Spells with additional effects receive 5% penalty
2084#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
2085 if (hasAdditionalEffects(sp))
2086 sp->spell_coeff_direct *= 0.95f;
2087
2088 // In Classic all Area of Effect spells receive 33% of the coefficient
2089 if (isAoESpell(sp))
2090 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 3;
2091#else
2092 if (hasAdditionalEffects(sp))
2093 {
2094 sp->spell_coeff_direct *= 0.95f;
2095 // In TBC, Area of Effect spells with additional effects receive 33% of the coefficient
2096 if (isAoESpell(sp))
2097 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 3;
2098 }
2099 else
2100 {
2101 // and normal Area of Effect spells receive 50% of the coefficient
2102 if (isAoESpell(sp))
2103 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 2;
2104 }
2105#endif
2106
2107 // Leech spells receive 50% of the coefficient
2108 if (isLeechSpell)
2109 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 2;
2110
2111 // Spells below level 20 receive a significant penalty
2112 if (sp->getBaseLevel() <= 20)
2113 {
2114 const auto penalty = 1.0f - ((20.0f - float(sp->getBaseLevel())) * 0.0375f);
2115 sp->spell_coeff_direct *= penalty;
2116 }
2117
2118 // Store coeff value as per missile / tick
2119 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2120 {
2121 if (sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL ||
2122#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
2123 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE ||
2124#endif
2125 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE ||
2126 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL ||
2127 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH)
2128 {
2129 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= baseDuration / sp->getEffectAmplitude(i);
2130 // For channeled spells which trigger another spell on each "missile", set triggered spell's coeff to match master spell's coeff
2131#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
2132 if (sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL)
2133#else
2134 if (sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL ||
2135 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE)
2136#endif
2137 {
2138 auto triggeredSpell = sSpellMgr.getMutableSpellInfo(sp->getEffectTriggerSpell(i));
2139 // But do not alter its coefficient if it's already overridden in database
2140 if (triggeredSpell != nullptr && triggeredSpell->spell_coeff_direct == -1)
2141 triggeredSpell->spell_coeff_direct = sp->spell_coeff_direct;
2142 }
2143 break;
2144 }
2145 }
2146 }
2147
2148 // Hybrid spells (spells with direct and over-time damage or direct and over-time healing effect)
2149 else if ((sp->hasDamagingEffect() && sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE)) ||
2150 (sp->hasHealingEffect() && sp->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL)))
2151 {
2152 auto spellDuration = baseDuration;
2153#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
2154 // Classic has 100% spell coefficient cap
2155 if (spellDuration > 15000)
2156 spellDuration = 15000;
2157#endif
2158 const auto castTime = spellCastTime / 3500;
2159 spellDuration /= 15000;
2160
2161 sp->spell_coeff_direct = (castTime * castTime) / (spellDuration + castTime);
2162 sp->spell_coeff_overtime = (spellDuration * spellDuration) / (castTime + spellDuration);
2163
2164 // Spells with additional effects receive 5% penalty
2165#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
2166 if (hasAdditionalEffects(sp))
2167 {
2168 sp->spell_coeff_direct *= 0.95f;
2169 sp->spell_coeff_overtime *= 0.95f;
2170 }
2171
2172 // In Classic all Area of Effect spells receive 33% of the coefficient
2173 if (isAoESpell(sp))
2174 {
2175 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 3;
2176 sp->spell_coeff_overtime /= 3;
2177 }
2178#else
2179 if (hasAdditionalEffects(sp))
2180 {
2181 sp->spell_coeff_direct *= 0.95f;
2182 sp->spell_coeff_overtime *= 0.95f;
2183 // In TBC, Area of Effect spells with additional effects receive 33% of the coefficient
2184 if (isAoESpell(sp))
2185 {
2186 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 3;
2187 sp->spell_coeff_overtime /= 3;
2188 }
2189 }
2190 else
2191 {
2192 // and normal Area of Effect spells receive 50% of the coefficient
2193 if (isAoESpell(sp))
2194 {
2195 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 2;
2196 sp->spell_coeff_overtime /= 2;
2197 }
2198 }
2199#endif
2200
2201 // Leech spells receive 50% of the coefficient
2202 if (isLeechSpell)
2203 {
2204 sp->spell_coeff_direct /= 2;
2205 sp->spell_coeff_overtime /= 2;
2206 }
2207
2208 // Spells below level 20 receive a significant penalty
2209 if (sp->getBaseLevel() <= 20)
2210 {
2211 const auto penalty = 1.0f - ((20.0f - float(sp->getBaseLevel())) * 0.0375f);
2212 sp->spell_coeff_direct *= penalty;
2213 sp->spell_coeff_overtime *= penalty;
2214 }
2215
2216 // Store over-time coeff value as per tick
2217 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2218 {
2219 if (sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE ||
2220 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL ||
2221 sp->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH)
2222 {
2223 /*
2224 If a spell has less than five ticks, each tick receives one-fifth of the bonus per tick.
2225 If an over time spell has 5 or more ticks, the spell receives full benefit, divided equally between the number of ticks.
2226 */
2227 const auto ticks = baseDuration / sp->getEffectAmplitude(i);
2228 if (ticks < 5)
2229 sp->spell_coeff_overtime /= 5;
2230 else
2231 sp->spell_coeff_overtime /= ticks;
2232 break;
2233 }
2234 }
2235 }
2236
